sentence: I. Lewis Scooter? Libby, former chief of staff to Vice President Richard Cheney, is reportedly planning to attend a fundraiser in March for embattled Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY), who is targeting Trump on the January 6 Committee.
author: Joel B. Pollak
title: Report: Scooter' Libby, Pardoned by Trump, to Attend Liz Cheney Fundraiser

sentence: On Friday night, the New York Times' Maggie Haberman reported: "Trump has been complaining loudly to people that SCOOTER LIBBY, who he pardoned, is attended a fundraiser for Liz Cheney.
author: John Wright
title: Trump is fuming over Scooter Libby attending a Liz Cheney fundraiser: report
